content: WelcomeI'm selling you a way to get eBay accounts for USA and Europe also + Payoneer account linked.some screenshot (edited)https://i.imgur.com/hQtDfiI.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/7uLXrth.jpgBasically i will tell you where you can find this type of account just for $8 (to give you the info)I do not want to be an intermediary between the seller and you, I will only give you the information about where you can buy and acquire them since the prices of the accounts are high and you must deal directly with the seller.I mention in advance that you must prepare good money, since each account costs from $199 to $350 (for UK too), the seller is verified and approved by admin from a authentic forum sellers well known to some, all the information i will be provided to you after making your payment to me, everything It is in a well-known forum that few people know about. It has happened to all of us that our ebay accounts are suspended and therefore we cannot open another account. Here I bring you the solution.Contact me at telegram: https://t.me/edphonesor WhatsApp: https://wa.me/+15633070017

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: eudomaruf on March 01, 2023, 01:13:25 PMUSA and Europe also + Payoneer account linked.If you sell your eBay account as well as the linked Payoneer account, then what will happen after the received the payment from the buyer? What will stay you away from using the Payoneer card virtually to purchase anything by the dollar which will be received from ebay. Also what will happen if ebay account lock or asked for kyc verification.
